verses.verse: וַ֠יִּשְׁלַח <S%H7971><s%> Vai-yish-lach sent; חִירָם chi-ram כחוּרָ֨ם <S%H2438><s%> chu-Ram Hiram קמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king צֹ֥ר <S%H6865><s%> tzor of Tyre מַלְאָכִים֮ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chim messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִיד֒ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David וַעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> va-'a-Tzei and timber אֲרָזִ֔ים <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim, of cedars וְחָרָשֵׁ֣י <S%H2796><s%> ve-cha-ra-Shei and carpenters קִ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> Kir, with masons וְחָרָשֵׁ֖י <S%H2796><s%> ve-cha-ra-Shei artificer עֵצִ֑ים <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim; trees לִבְנ֥וֹת <S%H1129><s%> liv-Not to build ל֖וֹ lo בָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit. him an house

וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-da' perceived דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for הֱכִינ֧וֹ <S%H3559><s%> he-chi-No had confirmed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD לְמֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech him king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; over Israel כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִשֵּׂ֤את <S%H5375><s%> nis-Set was lifted up לְמַ֙עְלָה֙ <S%H4605><s%> le-Ma'-lah on high מַלְכוּת֔וֹ <S%H4438><s%> mal-chu-To, for his kingdom בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur the sake עַמּ֥וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo because of his people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel פ Peh

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took דָּוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od more נָשִׁ֖ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim more wives בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; at Jerusalem וַיּ֧וֹלֶד <S%H3205><s%> vai-Yo-led begat דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od of more בָּנִ֥ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim more sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-va-Not. and daughters

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot Now these [are] the names הַיְלוּדִ֔ים <S%H3205><s%> hay-lu-Dim, of [his] children אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after הָיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> ha-yu- become ל֖וֹ lo בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; which he had in Jerusalem שַׁמּ֣וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> sham-Mu-a' Shammua וְשׁוֹבָ֔ב <S%H7727><s%> ve-sho-Vav, and Shobab נָתָ֖ן <S%H5416><s%> na-Tan Nathan וּשְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <S%H8010><s%> u-she-lo-Moh. and Solomon
וְיִבְחָ֥ר <S%H2984><s%> ve-yiv-Char And Ibhar וֶאֱלִישׁ֖וּעַ <S%H474><s%> ve-'e-li-Shu-a' and Elishua וְאֶלְפָּֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> ve-'el-Pa-let. and Elpalet
וְנֹ֥גַהּ <S%H5052><s%> ve-No-gah And Nogah וְנֶ֖פֶג <S%H5298><s%> ve-Ne-feg and Nepheg וְיָפִֽיעַ׃ <S%H3309><s%> ve-ya-Fi-a'. and Japhia
וֶאֱלִישָׁמָ֥ע <S%H476><s%> ve-'e-li-sha-Ma' And Elishama וּבְעֶלְיָדָ֖ע <S%H1182><s%> u-ve-'el-ya-Da' and Beeliada וֶאֱלִיפָֽלֶט׃ <S%H467><s%> ve-'e-li-Fa-let. and Eliphalet

וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U heard פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, And when the Philistines כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִמְשַׁ֨ח <S%H4886><s%> nim-Shach was anointed דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid that David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech king עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, over all Israel וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu went up כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim all the Philistines לְבַקֵּ֣שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David וַיֵּצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze [of it] and went out לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem. against

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> u-fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines בָּ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u; came וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <S%H6584><s%> vai-yif-she-Tu and spread בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> be-'E-mek themselves in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im. of Rephaim

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al enquired דָּוִ֤יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David בֵּאלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him of God לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הַאֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> ha-'e-'e-Leh Shall I go up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against; פְּלִשְׁתִּיִּים pe-lish-ti-yim כפְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, Philistine קוּנְתַתָּ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tam for I will deliver בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di; them into thine hand וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said ל֤וֹ lo יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Jehovah עֲלֵ֔ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh, unto him Go up וּנְתַתִּ֖ים <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tim will give בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha. your hand

וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu So they came up בְּבַֽעַל־ be-va-'al- פְּרָצִים֮ <S%H1188><s%> pe-ra-Tzim to Baalperazim וַיַּכֵּ֣ם <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Kem smote שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there דָּוִיד֒ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, them there Then David פָּרַ֨ץ <S%H6555><s%> pa-Ratz hath broken in הָֽאֱלֹהִ֧ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אוֹיְבַ֛י <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vai upon mine enemies בְּיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di by mine hand כְּפֶ֣רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> ke-Fe-retz like the breaking forth מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of waters עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Ken, after that קָֽרְא֛וּ <S%H7121><s%> ka-re-'U therefore they called שֵֽׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of that place הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he בַּ֥עַל Ba-'al פְּרָצִֽים׃ <S%H1188><s%> pe-ra-Tzim. Baalperazim

וַיַּעַזְבוּ־ <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'az-vu- And when they had left שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their gods וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer gave a commandment דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, there David וַיִּשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> vai-yis-sa-re-Fu and they were burned בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. with fire פ Peh

וַיֹּסִ֤יפוּ <S%H3254><s%> vai-yo-Si-fu yet again עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od yet פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, And the Philistines וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֖וּ <S%H6584><s%> vai-yif-she-Tu spread themselves abroad בָּעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> ba-'E-mek. in the valley

וַיִּשְׁאַ֨ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al enquired ע֤וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid Therefore David בֵּֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> be-lo-Him, again of God וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, and God לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo shall not תַֽעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> ta-'a-Leh unto him Go not up אַֽחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after הָסֵב֙ <S%H5437><s%> ha-Sev them turn away מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-lei-Hem, and וּבָ֥אתָ <S%H935><s%> u-Va-ta from them and come לָהֶ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem in מִמּ֥וּל <S%H4136><s%> mi-Mul upon them over against הַבְּכָאִֽים׃ <S%H1057><s%> hab-be-cha-'Im. the mulberry trees

וִ֠יהִי <S%H1961><s%> Vi-hi become כְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֞ <S%H8085><s%> ke-sha-me-'a-Cha And it shall be when thou shalt hear אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol a sound הַצְּעָדָה֙ <S%H6807><s%> hatz-tze-'a-Dah of going בְּרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> be-ra-Shei in the tops הַבְּכָאִ֔ים <S%H1057><s%> hab-be-cha-'Im, of the mulberry trees אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> 'az then תֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> te-Tze [that] then thou shalt go out בַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> vam-mil-cha-Mah; to battle כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza is gone forth הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him for God לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha, before לְהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> le-hak-Kot thee to smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim. of the Philistines

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as therefore did דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, David כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֖הוּ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Va-hu commanded הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; as God וַיַּכּוּ֙ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-Ku him and they smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines מִגִּבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> mig-giv-'on from Gibeon וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- far גָּֽזְרָה׃ <S%H1507><s%> Ga-ze-rah. even to Gazer

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze went out שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- And the fame דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all הָֽאֲרָצ֑וֹת <S%H776><s%> ha-'a-ra-Tzot; into all lands וַֽיהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פַּחְדּ֖וֹ <S%H6343><s%> pach-Do the fear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim. of him upon all nations
